title: S16 Ep39: The Miracle Collectors w/Joan Hill & Katie Mahon
itunes:title: The Miracle Collectors w/Joan Hill & Katie Mahon
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Miracle Collectors with guests Joan Hill & Katie Mahon
Dave & Tim open up today about Miracles in their own lives in a raw and emotional discussion with guests Joan Luise Hill & Katie Mahon.
As part of their own spiritual quest, miracle experts, Katie Mahon and Joan Luise Hill, discovered that when we are truly awake and present, miracles abound. While some defy explanation, others invite us to take a closer look, to discover common ground with each other, and to seek meaning in a whole new way.

Katie Mahon became a miracle expert the hard way. At nineteen, she walked away from serial killer Ted Bundy with the help of a stranger who appeared, seemingly, out of nowhere. 

Joan Luise Hill's introduction to miracles evolved as a series of coincidences that ultimately could not be ignored. 

Get their book here: https://amzn.to/3tV32bb

Visit their site here: www.themiraclecollectors.com
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
